From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Rumble broke through the clouds, still soaring over the land and
squinted when his optics picked up heat. His optics whired with
mechanical motion, as they extended on his face, magnifiying his view. 

"What the?" He exclaimed at the shapechanging creature. 

He righted himself in midair, and pulled one of his laser rifles off of
his back, holding it like you would a shotgun, and cut his jets, as he
started plummeting towards the ground, he landed, and bent downards to
stop the recoil, then took aim. 

"Wh, What in the slag are you?" he asked curiously, his finger twiching
nervously on the trigger.
